snippet: The census director, Robert M. Groves, says research during the 2010 census found that making changes increased response rates and improved accuracy.
abstract: Census Bureau wants to make broad changes to its surveys to keep pace with changing notions of race; research during the 2010 election found that making changes increased response rates and improved accuracy.
lead_paragraph: The census director, Robert M. Groves, says research during the 2010 census found that making changes increased response rates and improved accuracy.

headline.main: Census to Change Categories on Race
headline.print_headline: Census To Change Categories On Race
